title: SpectraMind V50 — Neuro-symbolic, Physics-informed Exoplanet Spectroscopy Pipeline
description:
SpectraMind V50 is a mission-grade, CLI-first, neuro-symbolic, physics-informed AI pipeline for the NeurIPS 2025 Ariel Data Challenge. It predicts exoplanet transmission spectra (μ, σ over 283 bins) from ESA Ariel’s simulated FGS1 photometry and AIRS spectroscopy. Key features:

  • Hybrid modeling: FGS1 → long-sequence State-Space Model (Mamba SSM); AIRS → molecule-/wavelength-aware Graph Neural Network with edge features and positional encodings.
  • Loss & constraints: Gaussian log-likelihood (GLL) + FFT smoothness + asymmetry penalty + symbolic physics constraints (smoothness, non-negativity, molecular coherence, photonic alignment).
  • Calibration: Temperature scaling, COREL bin-wise conformalization, per-bin coverage diagnostics.
  • Reproducibility: Hydra configs, DVC/lakeFS for data lineage, Poetry/Docker env locks, CI/CD workflows, deterministic self-tests, config hash manifests.
  • Diagnostics: UMAP/t-SNE latent maps, SHAP overlays, symbolic violation tables, FFT/autocorr, calibration maps, versioned HTML dashboards.
  • Kaggle integration: Runtime-constrained (≤9h GPU), selftest + submission packaging, two-notebook pattern (train / inference) [oai_citation:5‡Linking a Kaggle Notebook to the NeurIPS 2025 __Ariel Data Challenge__ Dataset.pdf](file-service://file-CJx4BY1j47jVgjFunfUSor) [oai_citation:6‡ArielSensorArray Restructuring & Upgrade Plan (SpectraMind V50 Upgrade).pdf](file-service://file-HxVuEVypZLdTZXMryqduJ9).

All functionality is orchestrated through a unified Typer CLI (`spectramind …`) with structured logging (`v50_debug_log.md`, `events.jsonl`) and symbolic-aware diagnostics. This release archives v0.3.0 for citation and reproducibility.
notes: Archived, citable release for reproducibility. Active development, CI logs, nightly Kaggle builds, and container artifacts are maintained in the GitHub repository.
references: NeurIPS 2025 Ariel Data Challenge: official datasets and leaderboard metric.
Hydra, DVC/lakeFS, Docker/Poetry: reproducibility stack for AI pipelines.
Diagnostics: UMAP/t-SNE, SHAP overlays, symbolic constraints, FFT & calibration maps.
